operations.notes: In order to get a parameters value, you must give the mac address and the parameter name of the parameter, by calling /mobileclient/get?type=get,macadd=....,param=.... .
In order to set a parameters value, you must give the mac address, the parameter name and the value of the parameter, by calling /mobileclient/set?type=set,macadd=....,param=....,value=.... .
